meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7666.

td.p: Nick Spicher, a museum educator from Everett, Washington
Lisa McAndrews, an intellectual property attorney from White Plains, New York
Henry Ayoola, a Ph.D. student from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,800)

tr.td: BEASTLY POETRY FILL-IN
LET'S GET ORGANIZED
POPCORN
BAND STANDS
ANNUAL EVENTS
WHAT A Q____T!
